Justice minister: Time to make stalking illegal in New Zealand https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/justice-minister-time-to-make-stalking-illegal-in-new-zealand/VW6K27VSVZG6PBW43FHMSDLJFY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/justice-minister-time-to-make-stalking-illegal-in-new-zealand/VW6K27VSVZG6PBW43FHMSDLJFY/ One in three women in NZ are victims of stalking. Wed, 23 Oct 2024 20:08:02 +0000 Stalking needs to have bigger consequences, says the Justice Minister. Photo / Getty Images

Gisborne Mayor urges greater public participation in local elections https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-mayor-urges-greater-public-participation-in-local-elections/D3BB2KNKIVB65EGSXCTEM6EBHE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-mayor-urges-greater-public-participation-in-local-elections/D3BB2KNKIVB65EGSXCTEM6EBHE/ Zita Campbell, Local Democracy ReporterTime to invite younger people and make them aware of roles council plays Wed, 23 Oct 2024 19:56:54 +0000 Mayor Rehette Stoltz is stressing the importance of people participating in local elections. She says local governance affects people's every-day lives through roads, water, rubbish collection, public parks, museums and more.
